bitfields.name: BOOT_SRC
bitfields.description: Specify the boot source

bitfields.name: BOOT_IF_INST
bitfields.description: Specify boot interface instance when XSPI or uSDHC is selected as boot source.

bitfields.name: ISP_UART_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable LPUART interface during ISP/serial boot mode.

bitfields.name: ISP_SPI_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable LPSPI interface during ISP/serial boot mode.

bitfields.name: ISP_I2C_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable LPI2C interface during ISP/serial boot mode.

bitfields.name: ISP_USB_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable HS USB (USB0) interface during ISP/serial boot mode.

bitfields.name: ISP_eUSB_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable eUSB (USB1) interface during ISP/serial boot mode.

bitfields.name: ISP_MODE_PIN_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable boot mode selection using ISP mode pins.

bitfields.name: ISP_DM_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable ISP mode entry through debug mailbox command.

bitfields.name: ISP_FT_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable ISP mode entry as a fall through if valid image is not found in boot media.

bitfields.name: ISP_API_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable ISP mode entry using ROM API.

bitfields.name: BOOT_SPEED
bitfields.description: System clock speed during boot.

values.name: High
values.description: High speed boot (300 MHz) - VDD2 = 1.1 V

values.name: Middle
values.description: Middle speed boot (192 MHz) - VDD2 = 1.0 V

bitfields.name: FA_CMD_DIS
bitfields.description: Controls whether DM-AP set FA mode command can be issued after authentication.

bitfields.name: NXP_FW_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable loading NXP signed SB3 files.

bitfields.name: ENF_SEC_BOOT
bitfields.description: Enforce secure boot.

bitfields.name: ENF_CNSA
bitfields.description: Enforce CNSA suite defined crypto algorithms for secure boot, update and debug features.

bitfields.name: ENF_TZM_PRESET
bitfields.description: Enforce TZM preset data. If absent image is deemed corrupted.

bitfields.name: REC_BOOT_EN
bitfields.description: Enable recovery boot through LP_FLEXCOM.

bitfields.name: DIS_XSPI_XIP
bitfields.description: Disable XIP image execution through XIP flash interfaces.

bitfields.name: DICE_SKIP
bitfields.description: Skip DICE CDI calculation during boot to reduce boot time.

bitfields.name: DICE_INC_NXP
bitfields.description: When set include NXP configuration fuse data in CDI calculations.

bitfields.name: DICE_INC_CUST
bitfields.description: When set include customer boot configuration fuse data in CDI calculations.

bitfields.name: FIPS_PUF_EN
bitfields.description: Enable self-test of PUF IP before usage during boot.

bitfields.name: FIPS_KDF_EN
bitfields.description: Enable FIPS self-test of CKDF and CMAC algorithm before usage during boot.

bitfields.name: FIPS_HMAC_EN
bitfields.description: Enable FIPS self-test of HMAC algorithm before usage during boot.

bitfields.name: FIPS_DRBG_EN
bitfields.description: Enable FIPS self-test of DRBG algorithm before usage during boot.

bitfields.name: FIPS_ECDSA_EN
bitfields.description: Enable FIPS self-test of ECDSA algorithm before usage during boot.

bitfields.name: FIPS_AES_EN
bitfields.description: Enable FIPS self-test of AES algorithm before usage during boot.

bitfields.name: FIPS_SHA2_EN
bitfields.description: Enable FIPS self-test of SHA2 algorithm before usage during boot.

bitfields.name: XSPI_NOR_RESET_TYPE_SOFT_EN
bitfields.description: Enable to send 6699 reset sequence before XSPI boot

bitfields.name: IPED_CTX_EN
bitfields.description: Default IPED configuration are generated from fuse word 144 to 151

bitfields.name: XSPI_NOR_RDP_EN
bitfields.description: Enable to release the NOR flash from Deep Power-down mode. It will send ABh before XSPI NOR boot

bitfields.name: XSPI_CACHE64_EN
bitfields.description: Enable the pSRAM cache

bitfields.name: DCFG_UUID
bitfields.description: Enable UUID matching check during Debug Credential (DC) validation.

bitfields.name: XSPI_DQS_INTERNAL_LOOPBACK_EN
bitfields.description: Enable to use internal loopback DQS as XSPI read clock

bitfields.name: IPED1_XEX_EN
bitfields.description: Enable XEX mode for all IPED1 regions.

bitfields.name: IPED0_LOCK_CTX
bitfields.description: Lock the corresponding IPED0 context.

bitfields.name: IPED1_LOCK_CTX
bitfields.description: Lock the corresponding IPED1 context.

bitfields.name: IPED0_GCM_CTX
bitfields.description: Enable GCM mode for corresponding IPED0 context.

bitfields.name: IPED0_GCM_AHBERR_CTX
bitfields.description: Enable AHB error on GCM tag failure for corresponding IPED0 context.

bitfields.name: IPED1_GCM_CTX
bitfields.description: Enable GCM mode for corresponding IPED1 context.

bitfields.name: IPED1_GCM_AHBERR_CTX
bitfields.description: Enable AHB error on GCM tag failure for corresponding IPED1 context.

bitfields.name: BOOT_RETRY_FAIL_LED_PIN_EN
bitfields.description: Boot Retry fail LED enable bit. ROM sets this GPIO after exhausting boot retry count.

bitfields.name: BOOT_RETRY_FAIL_LED_PIN_POL
bitfields.description: Output polarity. This field is valid only if BOOT_RETRY_FAIL_LED_PIN_EN is set.

bitfields.name: BOOT_RETRY_FAIL_LED_PIN_PORT
bitfields.description:
GPIO port. This field is valid only if BOOT_RETRY_FAIL_LED_PIN_EN is set.
xd - GPIO port x

bitfields.name: BOOT_RETRY_FAIL_LED_PIN_GPIO
bitfields.description:
GPIO pin number. This field is valid only if BOOT_RETRY_FAIL_LED_PIN_EN is set.
xd - GPIO pin x.

bitfields.name: SENSOR_RESET_LED_PIN_EN
bitfields.description: Sensor Reset LED enable bit. ROM sets this GPIO when last warm reset cause is detected as ITRC reset.

bitfields.name: SENSOR_RESET_LED_PIN_POL
bitfields.description: Output polarity. This field is valid only if SENSOR_RESET_LED_PIN_EN is set.

bitfields.name: SENSOR_RESET_LED_PIN_PORT
bitfields.description:
GPIO port.  This field is valid only if SENSOR_RESET_LED_PIN_EN is set.
xd - GPIO port x

bitfields.name: SENSOR_RESET_LED_PIN_GPIO
bitfields.description:
GPIO pin number. This field is valid only if SENSOR_RESET_LED_PIN_EN is set.
xd - GPIO pin x.

bitfields.name: ISP_REC_LED_PIN_EN
bitfields.description: LED enable bit. ROM sets this GPIO whenever boot image is not found in boot media and before entering ISP or recovery boot mode. Output polarity.

bitfields.name: ISP_REC_LED_PIN_POL
bitfields.description: Output polarity. Output polarity. This field is valid only if ISP_REC_LED_PIN_EN is set.

bitfields.name: ISP_REC_LED_PIN_PORT
bitfields.description:
GPIO port. This field is valid only if ISP_REC_LED_PIN_EN is set.
xd - GPIO port x

bitfields.name: ISP_REC_LED_PIN_GPIO
bitfields.description:
GPIO pin number. This field is valid only if ISP_REC_LED_PIN_EN is set.
xd - GPIO pin x.

bitfields.name: WDOG_TIMEOUT_10MS
bitfields.description:
A 10 ms timer started before jumping to user application.
nd - n x 10 ms

bitfields.name: POWERDOWN_TIMEOUT_SECS
bitfields.description:
Device enters deep-power down state if it idles beyond this time during ISP command handling loop.
nd - n x 1 s

bitfields.name: REC_BOOT_FC
bitfields.description:
Specifies the LP_FLEXCOMM connected to 1-bit SPI flash used for recovery boot. This field is valid only if REC_BOOT_EN is set.
xd - LP_FLEXCOMMx is selected, x = 0-13

bitfields.name: REC_BOOT_FC_PCS
bitfields.description: Specifies LP_FLEXCOMM PCS connected to 1-bit SPI flash used for recovery boot. This field is valid only if REC_BOOT_EN is set.

bitfields.name: REC_BOOT_FC_BAUDRATE
bitfields.description: Specifies LP_FLEXCOMM baudrate with 1-bit SPI flash used for recovery boot. This field is valid only if REC_BOOT_EN is set.

bitfields.name: XTAL_FREQ
bitfields.description: Specifies external XTAL frequency

bitfields.name: OSC_HIGH_GAIN_MODE
bitfields.description: Specifies power mode of external XTAL

bitfields.name: OSC_SETTLING_TIME
bitfields.description:
Specifies the settling time of OSC
0d - 390 μs (default)
nd - n × 100 μs × 1.3

bitfields.name: USB_VID
bitfields.description: USB Vendor ID

bitfields.name: USB_PID
bitfields.description: USB Product ID

bitfields.name: DBG_OVER_USB_DIS
bitfields.description: Disable debug over USB0 pins.

bitfields.name: DBG_OVER_USB_LOCK
bitfields.description: Enable debug over USB register write lock.

bitfields.name: DBG_OVER_USB_SEL_PORT
bitfields.description:
Defines which GPIO port is selected to enable debug over USB0 pins feature.
xd - GPIO port x

bitfields.name: DBG_OVER_USB_SEL_GPIO
bitfields.description:
Defines which GPIO pin is selected to enable debug over USB0 pins feature.
xd - GPIO pin x

bitfields.name: LPI2C_ADDRESS
bitfields.description:
If 00h, defaults to 10h for LPI2C target address.
If not 00h, use this value as the 7-bit LPI2C target address

bitfields.name: USBPLL_LOCK_TIME
bitfields.description:
Specifies the lock time of USB PLL
0d - 30 µs (default)
nd - n × 10 µs

bitfields.name: XSPI_NAND_SEARCH_CNT
bitfields.description: 0b - Search at most 1 block (for BCB)

bitfields.name: XSPI_NAND_COL_ADDR_WIDTH
bitfields.description: 0b - 11 bits (for 2 KB-page devices)

bitfields.name: XSPI_NAND_CS_INTERVAL
bitfields.description: CS de-asserted interval between two commands

bitfields.name: XSPI_NAND_SEARCH_STRIDE
bitfields.description: BCB search step/stride, aligned with block size

bitfields.name: XSPI_NAND_HOLD_TIME
bitfields.description: Hold time before interaction with NAND

values.description: Wait until NAND is idle (by polling NAND's status register)

bitfields.name: XSPI_NAND_RESET_TYPE
bitfields.description: 00b - No reset before interaction with NAND

values.description: No reset before interaction with NAND
Reset the NAND with dedicated reset pin

bitfields.name: XSPI_NAND_FREQ
bitfields.description: 000b - 80 MHz

bitfields.name: XSPI_PAGES_PER_BLOCK
bitfields.description: 00b - 64 Pages

bitfields.name: XSPI_FEATURE_CONFIG
bitfields.description:
Used for loading the arguments/parameters for device configuration commands
bit 0 - For Micron memory, it must be configured as 0b to disable continue read mode; for Macronix or Winbond memory, it must be configured as 1b to enable quad mode.
bit 3 - For Winbond memory, it must be configured as 1b to enable buffer mode.
bit 4 - Must be configured as 1b to enable error code correction
Others - Reserved

bitfields.name: XSPI_CFG_ERASE_SZ
bitfields.description:
Erase size for configuration pages. 
nd - Erase size 2^(n+8) bytes

bitfields.name: XSPI_STATIC_CFG_OFFSET
bitfields.description:
Offset expressed as multiple of 4 KB from where configuration pages/sectors start. Maximum memory mapped XSPI space is 128 MB hence 10 bit field.
XSPI_STATIC_CFG_ADDR = 0800_0000h + (XSPI_STATIC_CFG_OFFSET x 4096)

bitfields.name: IMAGE0_OFFSET
bitfields.description: Offset expressed as multiple of 4 KB from where configuration pages/sectors start.

bitfields.name: XSPI_ARB_NS_FW_VER
bitfields.description: Field determines which firmware version counter should be used for anti-rollback checking of dynamic configuration pages.

bitfields.name: XSPI0_START_OFFSET_0
bitfields.description: START_OFFSET (4 KB aligned)

bitfields.name: XSPI0_LENGTH_0
bitfields.description: LENGTH (4 KB block counts)

bitfields.name: XSPI0_START_OFFSET_1
bitfields.description: START_OFFSET (4 KB aligned)

bitfields.name: XSPI0_LENGTH_1
bitfields.description: LENGTH (4 KB block counts)

bitfields.name: XSPI0_START_OFFSET_2
bitfields.description: START_OFFSET (4 KB aligned)

bitfields.name: XSPI0_LENGTH_2
bitfields.description: LENGTH (4 KB block counts)

bitfields.name: XSPI0_START_OFFSET_3
bitfields.description: START_OFFSET (4 KB aligned)

bitfields.name: XSPI0_LENGTH_3
bitfields.description: LENGTH (4 KB block counts)

bitfields.name: XSPI1_START_OFFSET_0
bitfields.description: START_OFFSET (4 KB aligned)

bitfields.name: XSPI1_LENGTH_0
bitfields.description: LENGTH (4 KB block counts)

bitfields.name: XSPI1_START_OFFSET_1
bitfields.description: START_OFFSET (4 KB aligned)

bitfields.name: XSPI1_LENGTH_1
bitfields.description: LENGTH (4 KB block counts)

bitfields.name: XSPI1_START_OFFSET_2
bitfields.description: START_OFFSET (4 KB aligned)

bitfields.name: XSPI1_LENGTH_2
bitfields.description: LENGTH (4 KB block counts)

bitfields.name: XSPI1_START_OFFSET_3
bitfields.description: START_OFFSET (4 KB aligned)

bitfields.name: XSPI1_LENGTH_3
bitfields.description: LENGTH (4 KB block counts)

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_AUTO_PROBE_EN
bitfields.description: Quad SPI or Octal SPI flash memory auto-probe feature enable

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_PROBE_TYPE
bitfields.description: Quad SPI or Octal SPI flash memory probe type

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_TYPE
bitfields.description: Typical serial NOR flash memory types

values.description: Quad SPI flash memory address (by default, the chip supports 3B read)

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_DUMMY_CYCLES
bitfields.description: Together with XSPI_FLASH_DUMMY_CYCLES_UPPER, the 6-bit field configures Quad SPI or Octal SPI dummy cycles for read command

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_BOOT_FREQ
bitfields.description: Quad SPI or Octal SPI flash interface frequency

bitfields.name: XSPI_RESET_PIN_EN
bitfields.description: Enable to reset flash memory by reset pin or JEDEC

bitfields.name: XSPI_NOR_RESET_TYPE
bitfields.description: This field is valid only if XSPI_RESET_PIN_EN is set.

bitfields.name: XSPI_RESET_PIN_PORT
bitfields.description: GPIO port number. This field is valid only if XSPI_RESET_PIN_EN is set.

bitfields.name: XSPI_RESET_PIN_GPIO
bitfields.description: GPIO pin number. This field is valid only if XSPI_RESET_PIN_EN is set.

bitfields.name: XSPI_HOLD_TIME
bitfields.description: Wait time before accessing serial flash memory

bitfields.name: XSPI_PWR_HOLD_TIME
bitfields.description: Delay (wait time) after POR before accessing Quad SPI or Octal SPI flash memory devices, in addition to the delay that the XSPI_HOLD_TIME field specifies

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_DUMMY_CYCLES_UPPER
bitfields.description: Quad/Octal-SPI dummy cycles upper 2 bits for read command. See XSPI_FLASH_DUMMY_CYCLES

bitfields.name: XSPI_DELAY_CELL_NUM
bitfields.description:
Delay cell numbers for flash read sampling via external DQS
0 - Use the delay cell value calculated by ROM
Others - Use the delay cell value in terms of 100 ps

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_SEC_IMAGE_OFFSET
bitfields.description:
Offset of the second image
xd - x multiplied by 128 KB

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_IMAGE_SIZE
bitfields.description:
Size of the second image
0d - Same size as the image offset (XSPI_IMAGE_OFFSET)
1d - 128 KB
2d - 256 KB
md - m × 128 KB (m = 3-7)
8d - 1 MB
nd - (n-7) × 1 MB (n = 8-71)

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_ENHANCE_MODE
bitfields.description: XSPI enhance mode

registers.name: XSPI_CFG2
registers.description: Configure DLL and the subordinate delay chain for flash memory with SDR interface, see XSPI_DLLCRA register for more details.

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_SDR_DLLCRA
bitfields.description: Configure DLL and the subordinate delay chain for flash memory with SDR interface, see XSPI_DLLCRA register for more details.

registers.name: XSPI_CFG3
registers.description: Configure how XSPI samples the incoming data from external serial flash memory with SDR interface. See XSPI_SMPR register for more details.

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_SDR_SMPR
bitfields.description: Configure how XSPI samples the incoming data from external serial flash memory with SDR interface. See XSPI_SMPR register for more details.

registers.name: XSPI_CFG4
registers.description: Configure DLL and the subordinate delay chain for flash memory with DDR interface, see XSPI_DLLCRA register for more details.

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_DDR_DLLCRA
bitfields.description: Configure DLL and the subordinate delay chain for flash memory with DDR interface, see XSPI_DLLCRA register for more details.

registers.name: XSPI_CFG5
registers.description: Configure how XSPI samples the incoming data from external serial flash memory with DDR interface. See XSPI_SMPR register for more details.

bitfields.name: XSPI_FLASH_DDR_SMPR
bitfields.description: Configure how XSPI samples the incoming data from external serial flash memory with DDR interface. See XSPI_SMPR register for more details.

bitfields.name: SDHC_BUS_WIDTH
bitfields.description: eMMC bus width selection

bitfields.description: Power cycle enable

values.name: Enabled
values.description: Power cycle enabled via RST pad

bitfields.description: Power up wait selection

bitfields.name: SDHC_PWR_POL
bitfields.description: uSDHC reset polarity selection

bitfields.name: SDHC_RESET_PRE_IDLE
bitfields.description: eMMC disable pre-idle selection

bitfields.name: SDHC_MMC_SPEED
bitfields.description: eMMC speed selection

registers.name: SENSE_PVT_SP3
registers.description:
Sense domain PVT setpoint 3 CPU1/HiFi1 – Freq/Volt
250 MHz PVTS delay values, HiFi1[15:8], CPU1[7:0]

registers.name: COM_PVT_SP3
registers.description:
Compute domain PVT setpoint 3 CPU0/HiFi4 – Freq/Volt
325 MHz PVTS delay values, HiFi4[15:8], CPU0[7:0]

registers.name: SENSE_PVT_SP2
registers.description:
Sense domain PVT setpoint 2 CPU1/HiFi1 – Freq/Volt
160 MHz PVTS delay values, HiFi1[15:8], CPU1[7:0]

registers.name: COM_PVT_SP2
registers.description:
Compute domain PVT setpoint 2 CPU0/HiFi4 – Freq/Volt
192 MHz PVTS delay values, HiFi4[15:8], CPU0[7:0]

registers.name: SENSE_PVT_SP1
registers.description:
Sense domain PVT setpoint 1 CPU1/HiFi1 – Freq/Volt
100 MHz PVTS delay values, HiFi1[15:8], CPU1[7:0]

registers.name: COM_PVT_SP1
registers.description:
Compute domain PVT setpoint 1 CPU0/HiFi4 – Freq/Volt
110 MHz PVTS delay values, HiFi4[15:8], CPU0[7:0]
